00021 #include "xnodeconnector.h"

00024 //! Graph widget with a dialog which is initially hidden.
00025 //! \sa XGraph, XQGraphPainter
00026 class XQGraph : public QGLWidget
00027 {
00028     Q_OBJECT
00029 
00030 public:
00031     XQGraph( QWidget* parent = 0, Qt::WFlags fl = 0 );
00032     virtual ~XQGraph();
00033     //! register XGraph instance just after creating
00034     void setGraph(const shared_ptr<XGraph> &);
00035 
00036 protected:
00037     virtual void mousePressEvent ( QMouseEvent*);
00038     virtual void mouseReleaseEvent ( QMouseEvent*);
00039     virtual void mouseDoubleClickEvent ( QMouseEvent*);
00040     virtual void mouseMoveEvent ( QMouseEvent*);
00041     virtual void wheelEvent ( QWheelEvent *);
00042     virtual void showEvent ( QShowEvent * );
00043     virtual void hideEvent ( QHideEvent * );  
00044     //! openGL stuff
00045     virtual void initializeGL ();
00046     virtual void resizeGL ( int width, int height );
00047     virtual void paintGL ();
00048 private:  
00049     friend class XQGraphPainter;
00050     shared_ptr<XGraph> m_graph;
00051     shared_ptr<XQGraphPainter> m_painter;
00052     xqcon_ptr m_conDialog;
00053 };

00055 class Ui_FrmGraph;
